record.title: PERSONAL EXPLANATION
record.narrative:
PERSONAL EXPLANATION -- (House of Representatives - November 14, 2007)

[Page: H13917]

speaking.paragraph: Mr. Speaker, I was unavoidably absent during rollcall votes 1093 through 1105. Had I been present, I would have voted "yea" on rollcall 1093, "yea" on rollcall 1094, "nay" on rollcall 1095, "yea" on rollcall 1096, "yea" on rollcall 1097, "yea" on rollcall 1098, "yea" on rollcall 1099, "nay" on rollcall 1100, "nay" on rollcall 1101, "yea" on rollcall 1102, "yea" on rollcall 1103, "yea" on rollcall 1104, and "yea" on rollcall 1105.
